attributes.action: No household or towns to have Christmas lights/decorations up before 1st of December.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ban households and town centres from having christmas lights or decorations up before 1st of december, because it's getting to the point were it's halloween and children are trick or treating and people have christmas lights up it spoils the whole point of halloween and christmas and the same with bonfire night we don't want to see christmas lights up before the start of the christmas advent calender.
